queries.EQ_team_queue: SELECT Account.Name, CreatedDate, Contact.Name, Owner.Name, Owner.Alias, Product__r.Name, Severity__c, Status, Subject, Description, CaseNumber, Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c, Id, lastModifiedDate FROM Case WHERE Status_Closed__c = FALSE AND Product__r.Name IN ({product_name}) AND Owner.Name IN ({support_group}) ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC
queries.EQ_personal_queue: SELECT Account.Name, CreatedDate, Contact.Name, Owner.Name, Owner.Alias, Product__r.Name, Severity__c, Status, Subject, Description, CaseNumber, Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c, Id, lastModifiedDate FROM Case WHERE Status_Closed__c = FALSE AND Owner.Name LIKE '%{engineer_name}%' ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC
queries.EQ_opened_today: SELECT CaseNumber, Product__r.Name, Owner.Name FROM Case WHERE CreatedDate = TODAY AND Product__r.Name IN ({product_name}) AND Owner.Name IN ({support_engineer_list})
queries.MQ_queue_needs_commitment: SELECT CaseNumber, Product__r.Name, Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c FROM Case WHERE Status_Closed__c = FALSE  AND Owner.Name IN ({support_group}) AND Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c <= 0.03125 ORDER BY Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c ASC
queries.MQ_team_needs_commitment: SELECT CaseNumber, Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c, Status, Milestone_Target_Date__c, Owner.Name FROM Case WHERE Owner.Name IN ({team_list}) AND Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c > 0 AND Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c <= 1 AND Status_Closed__c = FALSE ORDER BY Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c ASC
